com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class ClickGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.ClickGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FocusManager

    public class ClickGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements FocusManager
    Object representing the entire GUI. All components should be a direct or indirect child of this objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<FixedComponent> components
      List of direct child components (i.e. panels).
      protected Interface inter
      The Interface to be used by the GUI.
      protected int width
      The width of the panels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for the GUI.

      Render the GUI (lowest component first, highest component last).

      • components

        protected java.util.List<FixedComponent> components
        List of direct child components (i.e. panels). The must all be FixedComponent.

        The Interface to be used by the GUI.

        The width of the panels.

        Handle the GUI being closed.

      • requestFocus

        public void requestFocus(Focusable component)
        Method to be called by a panel that requests focus within the GUI. Moves the panel requesting focus to the top.
        Specified by:
        requestFocus in interface FocusManager
        Parameters:
        component - the component requesting focus
